          	def self.call(job)

          			event = Event.find(@job_mapping[job.id])

          		rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
        
      16.

          			puts "ERROR: Attempt to notify #{@job_mapping[job.id]} failed."

          			return

          	# POST /event/remove_user
        
      177. 
      
        
    177.

      178.

      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
          	# remove the admin from the event.
        
      180. 
      
        
    180.

            # Finds the User with the remember_token stored in the session with the key :current_user_token
        
      320.

            # Logging in sets the session value and logging out removes it.
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          1
          
            def current_user
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          83

      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          83

      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          
          
            end

          	# Responds. Always includes err_code set to ERROR (SUCCESS by default).

          54

            # POST /user/get_profile_pic

          1
          
            def get_profile_pic

            def get_all_users

              user_count = 0

          				return ERR_INVALID_FIELD if not value.is_a?(Hash)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          213
          
          				return ERR_INVALID_FIELD if not value.has_key?(:status)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          		end
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          	
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          110
          
          		return SUCCESS
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          	end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          	# Creates a new event with the given parameters. list_of_users should
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          	# be a list of integer values corresponding to user IDs. time should
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          	# be an integer number of seconds since the Unix epoch. Also adds
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          	# the event to all of the users in list_of_users, and notifies them.
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          	# Schedules a task to notify users 5 minutes before the event starts. 
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          	# Returns:
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          	#  * Error code ( < 0 ) upon failure
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          	#  * ID of new Event ( > 0 ) upon success
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
          	def self.add_event(name, admin_id, time, user_list, description = "", location = "")
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          121
          
          		return ERR_INVALID_FIELD if not user_list.respond_to?('each')
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          120
          
          		return ERR_INVALID_FIELD if not user_list.include?(admin_id)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          		
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          117
          
          		user_list.each do |user_id|
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          217
          
          			return ERR_INVALID_FIELD if not is_valid_user_id?(user_id)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          		end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          117
          
          		description = "" if not description 
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          117
          
          		location = "" if not location
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          117
          
          		@event = Event.new(name: name, admin: admin_id, 
        
      58.

      59.

      61.

      62.

      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          117
          
          		return validity if validity < 0
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          109
          
          		success = @event.save

      67. 
      
        
    67.

      73.

          			user_list )
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
          		# Schedule a notification only if the event is starting more than 10
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          		# minutes from now. 
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          109
          
          		if  (time > (DateTime.now.to_i + 10*60))
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          11
          
          			time_string = Time.at(time).to_datetime.to_formatted_s(:rfc822)
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          11
          
          			notify_job_id = NotifyHandler.task_scheduler.in time_string, NotifyHandler
        
      80. 
      
        
    80.

      83.

          98

      86.

      87.

      90.

      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          	# Edits self, according to the new information given in event_info_hash. 
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          	# Valid keys are :name, :time, :description, :location.
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
          	# Returns ERR_INVALID_NAME or ERR_INVALID_TIME if those fields
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
          	# are invalid, else returns SUCCESS.
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          1
          
          	def edit_event(event_info_hash) 
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          7
          
          		if event_info_hash.has_key?(:name)
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          3
          
          			new_name = event_info_hash[:name]
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          3
          
          			return ERR_INVALID_NAME if new_name.blank? || new_name.length > NAME_MAX_LENGTH
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          1
          
          			self.name = new_name
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
          			self.update_attribute(:name, new_name)
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
          		end
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          5
          
          		if event_info_hash.has_key?(:time)
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          5
          
          			new_time = event_info_hash[:time].to_i
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          5
          
          				return ERR_INVALID_TIME if new_time.blank? || (new_time < DateTime.now.ago(60*15).to_i)
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          3
          
          			self.time = new_time
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          3
          
          			self.update_attribute(:time, new_time)
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          3
          
          			NotifyHandler.task_scheduler.unschedule(self.scheduler_job_id) if self.scheduler_job_id != -1
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          			# Schedule a notification only if the event is starting more than 10
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
          			# minutes from now. 
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          3
          
          			if  (self.time > (DateTime.now.to_i + 10*60))
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          2
          
          				time_string = Time.at(self.time).to_datetime.to_formatted_s(:rfc822)
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          2

      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          2

      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
          			end
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
          		end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          3

      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          1
          
          			self.description = event_info_hash[:description]
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          1
          
          			self.update_attribute(:description, self.description)
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
          		end
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          3

      121.

          2

      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          2

      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
          		end
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          3
          
          		return SUCCESS
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
          	end
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
          
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
          	# Should be called 5 minutes before the event is starting.
        
      128. 
      
        
    128.

      129.

          	# the event is about to start. 
        
      130.

          1
          
          	def notify_starting
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
          		user_list = []
        
      132.

          1
          
          		party_list.each do |uid, uhash|

          3

      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
          		end
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1

      136.

      137.

          	end
        
      138.

      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          	# Checks if the user is listed as an admin for this event.
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
          	def is_admin?(user_id)
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          24
          
          		return admin == user_id
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          	end
        
      143.

      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
          	# Adds user_list to the party_list for this event.
        
      145. 
      
        
    145.

      146.

      147.

          1
          
          	def add_user_list(user_list, skip_attribute_update = false)
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          135
          
          		user_hash = {}
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          135
          
          		user_list.each do |user_id|
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          258
          
          			user_hash[user_id] = { status: STATUS_NO_RESPONSE, 
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
          				condition: NoCondition.new.get_hash }
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
          		end
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          135
          
          		self.party_list.merge!(user_hash) { |key, old, new| old }
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          135
          
          		self.update_attribute(:party_list, self.party_list) if !skip_attribute_update
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
          	end
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
          
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          	# Add this event to the user list of all users in user_list
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
          	def add_to_user_event_lists(user_list)
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          127
          
          		user_list.each do |users_id| 
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          250
          
          			user = User.find(users_id)
        
      161.

          250

      162.

          		end
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
          	end
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
          	# Checks if there are currently any conditions which have been met.
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
          	# If there are, and the user is currently not attending, their status
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
          	# is changed to attending and they are notified of the change.
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          1
          
          	def check_conditions
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          191
          
          		clauses = Array.new
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          191
          
          		party_list.each do |uid, hash|
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          566
          
          			cond = hash[:condition]
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          566
          
          			if cond[:cond_type] != COND_NONE && cond[:cond_met] == COND_MET
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
          				clauses.push({ operands: false, value: uid })
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
          			elsif cond[:cond_type] == COND_NUM_ATTENDING
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          70
          
          				clauses.push({ operands: cond[:num_users], value: uid })
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
          
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
          			elsif cond[:cond_type] == COND_USER_ATTENDING_ANY
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
          
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          58
          
          				oper = Array.new
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          133
          
          				cond[:id_list].each { |id| oper.push(id)}
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
          				#cond[:user_list].each { |key, value| oper.push(value[:uid]) }
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          58
          
          				clauses.push({ operands: oper, value: uid })
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
          
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          			elsif cond[:cond_type] == COND_USER_ATTENDING_ALL
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
          				#cond[:user_list].each do |count, table|
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          47
          
          				cond[:id_list].each do |id|
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          88
          
          					clauses.push({ operands: [id], value: uid})
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
          					#clauses.push({ operands: [table[:uid]], value: uid })
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
          				end
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
          			else
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          391
          
          				if hash[:status] == STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          219
          
          					clauses.push({ operands: false, value: uid})
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          				else
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          172
          
          					clauses.push({ operands: true, value: uid})
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          				end
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
          			end
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
          		end
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          191
          
          		result = Event.compute_horn_formula(clauses)
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
          
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          191
          
          		result.each do |uid, value|
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          566
          
          			if party_list[uid][:condition][:cond_met] == COND_NOT_MET && party_list[uid][:condition][:cond_type] != COND_NONE
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          144
          
          				complete_condition(uid, Condition.create_from_hash(party_list[uid][:condition])) if !value
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
          			end
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
          		end
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
          
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
          	end
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
          
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
          	# solves horn formula
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          	# input clauses = [ { operands: [uid] || count, value: uid } ]
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
          	# returns hash of each value assigned to a satisfying boolean value
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          1
          
          	def self.compute_horn_formula(clauses)
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          192
          
          		lookup = Hash.new
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          192
          
          		clauses.each do |clause| 
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          609
          
          			lookup[clause[:value]] = false
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
          		end
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
          
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
          		begin
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          356
          
          			changed = false
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          356
          
          			falses = 0
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          1444
          
          			lookup.each { |key, value| falses += 1 if !value}
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
          
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          356
          
          			clauses.each do |clause|
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          1144
          
          				if lookup[clause[:value]]
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          297
          
          					next
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
          				end
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
          
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          847
          
          				if clause[:operands].kind_of?(Integer)
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          97
          
          					lhs = (falses < clause[:operands])
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
          				elsif clause[:operands].kind_of?(Array)
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          181
          
          					lhs = true
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          386
          
          					clause[:operands].each { |operand| lhs = lhs && lookup[operand] }
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
          
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
          				else
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          569
          
          					lhs = clause[:operands]
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
          				end
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
          
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          847
          
          				if lhs != lookup[clause[:value]]
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          225
          
          					lookup[clause[:value]] = lhs
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          225
          
          					changed = true
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
          				end
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
          			end
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          192
          
          		end while changed
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          192
          
          		return lookup
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
          	end
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
          
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
          	# Add a conditional acceptance for the given user.
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
          	# Does nothing if the user is not a member of this event.
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
          	# After adding the condition, checks if any conditions have been met
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
          	# and takes appropriate action. 
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          1
          
          	def add_condition(user_id, condition)
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          37
          
          		return if not party_list.has_key?(user_id)
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          34
          
          		party_list[user_id][:condition] = condition.get_hash
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          34
          
          		update_attribute(:party_list, party_list)
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          34
          
          		check_conditions
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          
          
          	end
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
          
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
          	# Removes the current conditional acceptance from this user.
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
          	# Does nothing if the user is not a member of the event or 
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
          	# if the user doesn't currently have any conditions.
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          1
          
          	def remove_condition(user_id)
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          2
          
          		return if not party_list.has_key?(user_id)
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          2
          
          		party_list[user_id][:condition] = NoCondition.new.get_hash
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          2
          
          		update_attribute(:party_list, party_list)
        
      264.

          	# Method to change a user's status to STATUS_ATTENDING in this event

    config/application.rb

    100.0 % covered

      5.

    6. 
          
          
          # Make sure the secret is at least 30 characters and all random,
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          # no regular words or you'll be exposed to dictionary attacks.
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          # You can use `rake secret` to generate a secure secret key.
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          
        
      10. 
      
        
    10.

          1
          
          	describe "when creating notification for a new event" do
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          2
          
          		before { @notif = EventNotification.new(NOTIF_NEW_EVENT, @event) }
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
          		it "should return proper notification" do
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
          			n_hash = @notif.get_hash
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
          			n_hash[:notif_type].should eq(NOTIF_NEW_EVENT)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
          			n_hash[:event].should eq(@event.id)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
          			n_hash[:name].should eq(@event.name)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
          			n_hash[:creator][:name].should eq("Test User")
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
          			n_hash[:creator][:email].should eq("test@example.com")
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
          			curr_time = DateTime.current.to_i
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          			# Allow a one-second difference in case the time changed
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
          			((n_hash[:notif_time] == curr_time) || (n_hash[:notif_time] == curr_time - 1)).should be_true
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
          			n_hash[:location].should eq(@event.location)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          		end
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          	end
        
      33.

          end

      48.

          					@new_user1.event_list.should_not include(@event_id)
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          1
          
          					@new_user2.event_list.should_not include(@event_id) 
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          1
          
          					@new_user1.notification_list.should have(0).items
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          1
          
          					@new_user2.notification_list.should have(0).items 
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          1
          
          					@admin.notification_list.should have(0).items
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1
          
          					@other.notification_list.should have(1).items 
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
          					@event.reload
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          1
          
          					@event.get_user_status(@new_user1.id).should eq nil
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          1
          
          					@event.get_user_status(@new_user2.id).should eq nil
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
          				end	
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
          			end
        
      163.

      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
          						user_list: "t_other@example.com,friend2@example.com" }
        
      169. 
      
        
    169.

    170. 
          1

          1
          
          					JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq SUCCESS

      177.

      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          1
          
          	describe "when inviting a group to an event (event/invite_group)" do
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
          
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          1
          
          		before do
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          2
          
          			@admin = User.new(name: "Test Name", email: "test@example.com",
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          2
          
          			@admin.add
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          2
          
          			@other = User.new(name: "Test Other", email: "t_other@example.com",
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          2
          
          			@other.add
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          2
          
          			@event_id = Event.add_event("Test Event", @admin.id, DateTime.now.to_i + 10, [@admin.id, @other.id])
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          2
          
          			@event = Event.find(@event_id)
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          2
          
          			@admin_token = User.new_token
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          2
          
          			@admin.reload
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          2
          
          			@other.reload
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          2
          
          			@admin.update_attribute(:remember_token, User.hash(@admin_token))
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          2
          
          			@new_user1 = User.new(name: "Friend One", email: "friend1@example.com",
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          2
          
          			@new_user1.add
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          2
          
          			@new_user2 = User.new(name: "Friend Two", email: "friend2@example.com",
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          2
          
          			@new_user2.add
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          2
          
          			@new_user1.reload
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          2
          
          			@new_user2.reload
        
      265.

          			@request.cookies['current_user_token'] = @admin_token
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          
          
          		end
        
      267.

          	describe "when updating an existing user's status" do

          1
          
          		before do
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          4

          				password: "test_password")

          4

          4

      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          4

          4

          4
          
          			@event = Event.find(@event_id)
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          4

      331.

          4

          4

      337. 
      
        
    337. 
          
          
          
        
      338. 
      
        
    338. 
          1
          
          		it "should fail if the user isn't signed in" do
        
      339. 
      
        
    339. 
          1
          
          			@request.cookies['current_user_token'] = 'aBdsfg135_123'
        
      340. 
      
        
    340. 
          1
          
          			post 'update_user_status', { format: 'json', event: @event_id,
        
      341.

          1

      343.

          		end

          1

          1

      347. 
      
        
    347. 
          1
          
          			post 'update_user_status', { format: 'json', event: 234525731,

      350.

          		end
        
      351.

      352. 
      
        
    352. 
          1
          
          		it "should change the admin's status" do
        
      353. 
      
        
    353. 
          1
          
          			@request.cookies['current_user_token'] = @admin_token
        
      354. 
      
        
    354. 
          1
          
          			post 'update_user_status', { format: 'json', event: @event_id,
        
      355. 
      
        
    355. 
          
          
          				status: STATUS_NOT_ATTENDING }
        
      356. 
      
        
    356. 
          1

      357. 
      
        
    357. 
          1
          
          			@event.reload
        
      358. 
      
        
    358. 
          1
          
          			@event.get_user_status(@admin.id).should eq STATUS_NOT_ATTENDING
        
      359.

          1
          
          			@event.get_user_status(@other.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      360.

          		end
        
      361. 
      
        
    361. 
          
          
          
        
      362. 
      
        
    362. 
          1
          
          		it "should change the other user's status" do
        
      363. 
      
        
    363. 
          1
          
          			@request.cookies['current_user_token'] = @other_token
        
      364. 
      
        
    364. 
          1
          
          			post 'update_user_status', { format: 'json', event: @event_id,
        
      365. 
      
        
    365. 
          
          
          				status: STATUS_ATTENDING }
        
      366. 
      
        
    366. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq SUCCESS
        
      367. 
      
        
    367. 
          1
          
          			@event.reload
        
      368. 
      
        
    368. 
          1
          
          			@event.get_user_status(@other.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      369. 
      
        
    369. 
          1
          
          			@event.get_user_status(@admin.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      370. 
      
        
    370. 
          
          
          		end
        
      371. 
      
        
    371. 
          
          
          	end
        
      372.

          1
          
          	describe "when updating a status with conditions" do
        
      374. 
      
        
    374. 
          1
          
          		before do
        
      375. 
      
        
    375. 
          7
          
          			@admin = User.new(name: "Test Name", email: "test@example.com",
        
      376. 
      
        
    376. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      377. 
      
        
    377. 
          7
          
          			@admin.add
        
      378. 
      
        
    378. 
          7
          
          			@other = User.new(name: "Test Other", email: "t_other@example.com",
        
      379. 
      
        
    379. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      380. 
      
        
    380. 
          7
          
          			@other.add
        
      381. 
      
        
    381. 
          7
          
          			@other1 = User.new(name: "Test OtherOne", email: "t_other1@example.com",
        
      382. 
      
        
    382. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")

    383. 
          7

      384.

          				[@admin.id, @other.id, @other1.id])

          7

      387. 
      
        
    387. 
          7

      388. 
      
        
    388. 
          7
          
          			@other_token = User.new_token
        
      389. 
      
        
    389. 
          7
          
          			@admin.reload
        
      390. 
      
        
    390. 
          7
          
          			@other.reload

          7
          
          			@admin.update_attribute(:remember_token, User.hash(@admin_token))
        
      392.

          7

          		end

          1
          
          		describe "add COND_NUM_ATTENDING with a negative number" do
        
      396. 
      
        
    396. 
          1
          
          			it "error and respond with ERR_INVALID_FIELD" do
        
      397. 
      
        
    397. 
          1
          
          				@request.cookies['current_user_token'] = @other_token
        
      398. 
      
        
    398. 
          1
          
          				post 'add_cond_acceptance', { format: 'json', event: @event_id,
        
      399. 
      
        
    399. 
          
          
          					condition_type: COND_NUM_ATTENDING, condition: -1 }
        
      400. 
      
        
    400. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq ERR_INVALID_FIELD
        
      401. 
      
        
    401. 
          
          
          			end
        
      402. 
      
        
    402. 
          
          
          		end

      474.

          4

      480.

      481.

          1
          
          		it "should fail if the user isn't signed in" do

          1

          1

          1

      503. 
      
        
    503. 
          1
          
          		it "should return the correct fields" do
        
      504. 
      
        
    504. 
          1
          
          			@request.cookies['current_user_token'] = @admin_token
        
      505. 
      
        
    505. 
          1
          
          			post 'view', { format: 'json', event: @event_id }
        
      506. 
      
        
    506. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq SUCCESS
        
      507. 
      
        
    507. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['event'].should eq @event_id
        
      508. 
      
        
    508. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['title'].should eq "Test Event"
        
      509. 
      
        
    509. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['creator'].should eq @admin.id
        
      510. 
      
        
    510. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['time'].should eq @event.time
        
      511. 
      
        
    511. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['location'].should eq "A Test Facility"
        
      512. 
      
        
    512. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['users']['user_count'].should eq 2
        
      513. 
      
        
    513. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['description'].should eq "Testing Event"
        
      514. 
      
        
    514. 
          
          
          		end
        
      515. 
      
        
    515. 
          
          
          	end

          3

      533. 
      
        
    533. 
          1
          
          		it "should do nothing if the admin removes himself" do
        
      534. 
      
        
    534. 
          1
          
          			@request.cookies['current_user_token'] = @admin_token
        
      535. 
      
        
    535. 
          1
          
          			delete 'remove_user', { format: 'json', event: @event_id, 
        
      536. 
      
        
    536. 
          
          
          				user_remove: @admin.email }
        
      537. 
      
        
    537. 
          1
          
          			@admin.reload
        
      538. 
      
        
    538. 
          1
          
          			@event.reload

          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq ERR_INVALID_FIELD
        
      540.

          1
          
          			@admin.event_list.should include(@event_id)
        
      541.

      542.

          		end
        
      543.

      544. 
      
        
    544. 
          1
          
          		it "should do nothing if attempting to remove a user not in the event" do
        
      545. 
      
        
    545. 
          1
          
          			new_user = User.new(name: "Test Other", email: "test99@example.com",
        
      546. 
      
        
    546. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      547. 
      
        
    547. 
          1
          
          			new_user.add

    548. 
          1

    550. 
          
          
          				user_remove: new_user.email }

    551. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq SUCCESS
        
      552. 
      
        
    552. 
          1
          
          			@admin.reload
        
      553. 
      
        
    553. 
          1

          1

          		end

    561.

      569.

          1
          
          			@event.get_user_status(@other.id).should eq nil

      572.

          		end
        
      573. 
      
        
    573. 
          
          
          	end
        
      574. 
      
        
    574. 
          
          
          
        
      575. 
      
        
    575. 
          1
          
          	describe "when cancelling an event (event/cancel_event)" do
        
      576. 
      
        
    576. 
          1
          
          		before do
        
      577. 
      
        
    577. 
          2
          
          			@admin = User.new(name: "Test Name", email: "test@example.com",
        
      578. 
      
        
    578. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      579. 
      
        
    579. 
          2
          
          			@admin.add
        
      580. 
      
        
    580. 
          2
          
          			@other = User.new(name: "Test Other", email: "t_other@example.com",
        
      581. 
      
        
    581. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      582. 
      
        
    582. 
          2
          
          			@other.add
        
      583. 
      
        
    583. 
          2
          
          			@event_id = Event.add_event("Test Event", @admin.id, DateTime.now.to_i + 10, [@admin.id, @other.id], "Testing Event", "A Test Facility")
        
      584. 
      
        
    584. 
          2
          
          			@event = Event.find(@event_id)
        
      585. 
      
        
    585. 
          2

    111. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          5
          
          			@user.add
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          5
          
          			@other = User.new(name: "Test Other", email: "t_other@example.com",
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          5
          
          			@other.add
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          5
          
          			@group_id = Group.add_group("Test Group", [@user.id, @other.id])
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          5
          
          			@group = Group.find(@group_id)
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          5
          
          			@user_token = User.new_token
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          5
          
          			@user.reload
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          5
          
          			@other.reload
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          5
          
          			@user.update_attribute(:remember_token, User.hash(@user_token))
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          5
          
          			@new_user1 = User.new(name: "Friend One", email: "friend1@example.com",
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          5
          
          			@new_user1.add
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          5
          
          			@new_user2 = User.new(name: "Friend Two", email: "friend2@example.com",
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          5
          
          			@new_user2.add
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          5
          
          			@new_user1.reload
        
      129.

          5
          
          			@new_user2.reload
        
      130.

          		end

      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
          		describe "when adding as member of the group" do
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          4
          
          			before { @request.cookies['current_user_token'] = @user_token }
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
          			describe "with all valid users" do
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
          				before do
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          1
          
          					post 'add_users', { format: 'json', group: @group_id,
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          						user_list: "friend1@example.com,friend2@example.com" }
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          1
          
          					@user.reload
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          1
          
          					@other.reload
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1

          1
          
          					@new_user2.reload
        
      142.

          				end
        
      143.

          1
          
          				it "should be successful" do
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          1
          
          					JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq SUCCESS
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          1
          
          					@user.group_list.should include(@group_id)
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          1
          
          					@other.group_list.should include(@group_id) 
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          1
          
          					@new_user1.group_list.should include(@group_id)
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
          					@new_user2.group_list.should include(@group_id) 
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          1
          
          					@group.reload
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          1
          
          					@group.user_list.should include(@new_user1.id)
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          1
          
          					@group.user_list.should include(@new_user2.id)
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
          				end				 
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
          			end
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          1
          
          			describe "with an invalid user" do
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          1
          
          				before do
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1
          
          					post 'add_users', { format: 'json', group: @group_id,
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
          						user_list: "ran_email_bad@example.com,friend2@example.com" }
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          1
          
          					@user.reload
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          1
          
          					@other.reload
        
      161.

          1

          1
          
          					@new_user2.reload

      164.

          				it "should return an error" do

    166. 
          1
          
          					@user.group_list.should include(@group_id)
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          1
          
          					@other.group_list.should include(@group_id)

          1
          
          					@new_user1.group_list.should_not include(@group_id)
        
      169.

          1

    170. 
          1
          
          					@group.reload

          1

      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          1
          
          					@group.user_list.should_not include(@new_user2.id)
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
          				end	
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
          			end

      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          1
          
          				before do
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          1
          
          					post 'add_users', { format: 'json', group: @group_id,
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
          						user_list: "t_other@example.com,friend2@example.com" }

          1
          
          					@user.reload
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          1
          
          					@other.reload

          1

      184.

      185.

          1
          
          				it "should be successful but ignore duplicate" do
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1
          
          					JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq SUCCESS
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          1
          
          					@user.group_list.should include(@group_id)
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          1

          1
          
          					@other.group_list.should have(1).items

    190. 
          1
          
          					@new_user2.group_list.should include(@group_id)

    191. 
          1
          
          					@group.reload

    192. 
          1
          
          					@group.user_list.should have(3).items

    193. 
          1
          
          					@group.user_list.should include(@new_user2.id)
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          1
          
          					@group.user_list.should_not include(@new_user1.id)
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          				end	
        
      196.

    244. 
          1
          
          	describe "when viewing a group (group/view)" do
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          1
          
          		before do
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          5
          
          			@user = User.new(name: "Test Name", email: "test@example.com",
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          5
          
          			@user.add
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          5
          
          			@other = User.new(name: "Test Other", email: "t_other@example.com",
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          5
          
          			@other.add
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          5
          
          			@group1_id = Group.add_group("Test Group 1", [@user.id, @other.id], "Testing Group")
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          5
          
          			@group1 = Group.find(@group1_id)
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          5
          
          			@group2_id = Group.add_group("Test Group 2", [@user.id, @other.id])
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          5
          
          			@group2 = Group.find(@group2_id)
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          5
          
          			@user_token = User.new_token
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          5
          
          			@user.reload
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          5
          
          			@other.reload
        
      259.

          5
          
          			@user.update_attribute(:remember_token, User.hash(@user_token))
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
          		end
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
          
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          1
          
          		it "should fail if the user isn't signed in" do
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          1
          
          			@request.cookies['current_user_token'] = 'aBdsfg135_123'
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          1
          
          			post 'view', { format: 'json', group: @group1_id }
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq ERR_INVALID_SESSION
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          
          
          		end
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
          
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          1
          
          		it "should fail if requested from a nonmember" do
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          1
          
          			user2 = User.new(name: "User Two", email: "user2@example.com", 
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          1
          
          			user2_token = User.new_token
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          1
          
          			user2.update_attribute(:remember_token, User.hash(user2_token))
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          1
          
          			@request.cookies['current_user_token'] = user2_token
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          1
          
          			post 'view', { format: 'json', group: @group1_id }
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq ERR_INVALID_PERMISSIONS
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
          		end
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
          
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          1
          
          		it "should fail if the group ID isn't valid" do
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          1
          
          			@request.cookies['current_user_token'] = @user_token
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          1
          
          			post 'view', { format: 'json', group: 234525731 }
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq ERR_INVALID_FIELD
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
          		end
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          
          
          
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          1
          
          		it "should return the correct fields for group 1" do
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          1
          
          			@request.cookies['current_user_token'] = @user_token
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          1
          
          			post 'view', { format: 'json', group: @group1_id }
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq SUCCESS
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['group'].should eq @group1_id
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['name'].should eq "Test Group 1"
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['users']['user_count'].should eq 2
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['description'].should eq "Testing Group"
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          
          
          		end
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
          
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          1
          
          		it "should return the correct fields for group 2" do
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          1
          
          			@request.cookies['current_user_token'] = @user_token
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          1
          
          			post 'view', { format: 'json', group: @group2_id }
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq SUCCESS
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['group'].should eq @group2_id
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['name'].should eq "Test Group 2"
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['users']['user_count'].should eq 2
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['description'].should eq ""
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          
          
          		end
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          
          
          	end
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          
          
          
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          1
          
          	describe "when removing a user (group/remove_user)" do
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          1
          
          		before do
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          4
          
          			@user = User.new(name: "Test Name", email: "test@example.com",
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          4
          
          			@user.add
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          4
          
          			@other = User.new(name: "Test Other", email: "t_other@example.com",
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          4
          
          			@other.add
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          4
          
          			@group_id = Group.add_group("Test Group", [@user.id, @other.id])
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          4
          
          			@group = Group.find(@group_id)
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          4
          
          			@user_token = User.new_token
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          4
          
          			@user.reload
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          4
          
          			@other.reload
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          4
          
          			@user.update_attribute(:remember_token, User.hash(@user_token))
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          
          
          		end
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          
          
          
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          1
          
          		it "should do nothing if attempted by a user not in the group" do
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          1
          
          			new_user = User.new(name: "Test Other", email: "test99@example.com",
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          1
          
          			new_user.add
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          1
          
          			new_user_token = User.new_token
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          1
          
          			new_user.update_attribute(:remember_token, User.hash(new_user_token))
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          1
          
          			@request.cookies['current_user_token'] = new_user_token
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          1
          
          			delete 'remove_user', { format: 'json', group: @group_id, 
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          
          
          				user_remove: @user.email }
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          1
          
          			JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq ERR_INVALID_PERMISSIONS
        
      331. 
      
        
    331.

          			it "should return { err_code: ERR_EMAIL_TAKEN}" do

          1

      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
          				post 'add_user', { format: 'json', name: 'Test Name', email: 'test@example.com', password: 'nopassword' }
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq ERR_EMAIL_TAKEN
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['user_id'].should eq nil
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          			end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
          		end
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          	end
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
          
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          1
          
          	describe "login_user, logout_user" do
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
          		before do
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          4
          
          			@user = User.new(name: 'Test Name', email: 'test@example.com', password: 'nopassword')
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          4
          
          			@user.add
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
          		end
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
          		describe "login with proper credentials" do
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          1
          
          			it "should return SUCCESS, and change remember_token of user" do
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          1
          
          				old_token = @user.remember_token
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          1
          
          				post 'login_user', { format: 'json', email: 'test@example.com', password: 'nopassword' }
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq SUCCESS
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['user_id'].should eq @user.id
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['name'].should eq @user.name
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['email'].should eq @user.email
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          1
          
          				@user.reload
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          1
          
          				@user.remember_token.should_not eq old_token
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
          			end
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
          		end
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
          
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          1
          
          		describe "login with improper credentials" do
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          1
          
          			it "should return ERR_BAD_CREDENTIALS, and change remember_token of user" do
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
          				post 'login_user', { format: 'json', email: 'test@example.com', password: 'yespassword' }

    93. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq ERR_BAD_CREDENTIALS
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
          			end
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
          		end
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
          
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          1

      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          1
          
          			it "should have user[device_token] not nil" do
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          1
          
          				@user.device_tokens.empty?.should eq true
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
          				post 'login_user', { format: 'json', email: 'test@example.com', password: 'nopassword', device_token: '0000' }

          1
          
          				@user.reload
        
      102.

          1

      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
          			end
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
          		end
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
          
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          1
          
          		describe "logout user" do
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          1
          
          			it "should reset remember_token = nil" do
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          1
          
          				@user_token = User.new_token
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          1
          
          				@user.update_attribute(:remember_token, User.hash(@user_token))
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          1
          
          				@request.cookies['current_user_token'] =  @user_token
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          1
          
          				delete 'logout_user'
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          1
          
          				@user.reload
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          1
          
          				@user.remember_token.should_not eq User.hash(@user_token)
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
          			end
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
          		end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
          	end
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
          
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          1
          
          	describe "auth_facebook" do
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
          
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          1
          
          		before do
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          2
          
          			@token = FB_TOKEN
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
          		end
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
          
        
      124.

          1

          1

          				JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq ERR_BAD_CREDENTIALS
        
      128.

          			end
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
          		end
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
          
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
          		describe "autenticate w/ proper token, email not in db" do
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
          			it "should create new user with fb_id in database" do
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
          				User.find_by(email: 'wufftest@gmail.com').should eq nil
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
          				post 'auth_facebook', { format: 'json', facebook_id: FB_ID, facebook_token: @token }
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq SUCCESS
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          1
          
          				User.find_by(fb_id: FB_ID).should_not eq nil
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          			end
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
          		end
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          	end
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
          
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          1
          
          	describe "get_facebook_friends" do
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
          		describe "as a valid Facebook user" do
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          1
          
          			before do
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          1
          
          				post 'auth_facebook', { format: 'json', facebook_id: FB_ID, facebook_token: FB_TOKEN }
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          1
          
          				@fb_user_token = @response.cookies['current_user_token'] 
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
          			end
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
          			it "should return all of their Facebook friends" do
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          1
          
          				@request.cookies['current_user_token'] =  @fb_user_token 
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          1
          
          				get 'get_facebook_friends'
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq SUCCESS
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
          				user_count = JSON.parse(response.body)['count']
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          1
          
          				user_count.should >= 2
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          1
          
          				user_name_list = []
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          1
          
          				for i in 1..user_count
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          5
          
          					JSON.parse(response.body)[i.to_s]['id'].should be_kind_of(String) 
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          5
          
          					user_name_list <<= JSON.parse(response.body)[i.to_s]['name']
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
          				end
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          1
          
          				user_name_list.should include("Erik T Krogen", "Sampson Gu")
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
          			end
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
          		end
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
          
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          1
          
          		describe "as a non-Facebook user" do
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          1
          
          			before do
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
          				@other = User.new(name: "Test Other", email: "t_other@example.com",
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
          					password: "test_password")
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          1
          
          				@other.add
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          1
          
          				@other_token = User.new_token
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          1
          
          				@other.update_attribute(:remember_token, User.hash(@other_token))
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          1
          
          				@request.cookies['current_user_token'] =  @other_token 
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
          			end
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          1
          
          			it "should return all of their Facebook friends" do
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          1
          
          				get 'get_facebook_friends'
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq SUCCESS
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1

      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
          			end
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
          		end
        
      178. 
      
        
    178.

          5

    254. 
          5

    255. 
          5

    256. 
          5

      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
          					password: "test_password")
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          5

      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          5

          5

      261.

          5

      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
          		end
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
          
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          1
          
          		describe "has_notifications returns bool" do
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          1
          
          			it "returns false when notif list empty" do
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          1
          
          				get 'has_notifications?'
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['notif'].should eq false
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          
          
          			end
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
          
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          1
          
          			it "returns true when notif list not 0" do
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          1
          
          				@user.post_notification(FriendNotification.new(@other))
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          1
          
          				get 'has_notifications?'
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['notif'].should eq true
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          
          
          			end
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
          		end
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
          
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          1
          
          		describe "get_notifications returns JSON dictionary of count of notif and each key(notif) = count #" do
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          1
          
          			it "returns 0 count" do
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          1
          
          				get 'get_notifications'
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['notif_count'].should eq 0
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          
          
          			end
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
          
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          1
          
          			it "returns 1 count after adding one notification and response[1] != nil" do
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          1
          
          				@user.post_notification(FriendNotification.new(@other))
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          1
          
          				get 'get_notifications'
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['notif_count'].should eq 1
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          1
          
          				JSON.parse(response.body)['1'].should_not eq nil
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
          			end
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          
          
          		end
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
          
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          1
          
          		describe "clear_notifications returns SUCCESS and clears notification_list" do
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          1
          
          				it "returns SUCCESS" do
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          1
          
          				@user.post_notification(FriendNotification.new(@other))
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          1
          
          				delete 'clear_notifications'
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          1
          
          				@user.reload

          			end
        
      298.

          	describe "get_events" do

      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          14
