      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          14
          
          			@user.add
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          14
          
          			@user_token = User.new_token
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          14
          
          			@user.update_attribute(:remember_token, User.hash(@user_token))
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          14
          
          			@other = User.new(name: "Test Other", email: "t_other@example.com",
        
      310.

    323. 
          1
          
          			describe "for the event creator" do
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          1
          
          				before do
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          2
          
          					@request.cookies['current_user_token'] =  @user_token 
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          2
          
          					get 'get_events'
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          
          
          				end
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          2
          
          				specify { JSON.parse(response.body)['err_code'].should eq SUCCESS }
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          1
          
          				it "should appear with proper fields" do
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          1
          
          					JSON.parse(response.body)['event_count'].should eq 1
        
      331. 
      
        
    331. 
          1
          
          					JSON.parse(response.body)['1']['event'].should eq @event_id
        
      332. 
      
        
    332. 
          1
          
          					JSON.parse(response.body)['1']['title'].should eq "Test Event"
        
      333. 
      
        
    333. 
          1
          
          					users = JSON.parse(response.body)['1']['users']
        
      334. 
      
        
    334. 
          1
          
          					user_count = users['user_count']
        
      335. 
      
        
    335. 
          1
          
          					user_count.should eq 2
        
      336. 
      
        
    336. 
          
          
          					# Possible refactoring here
        
      337. 
      
        
    337. 
          1
          
          					user_names = []
        
      338. 
      
        
    338. 
          1
          
          					user_email = []
        
      339. 
      
        
    339. 
          1
          
          					user_status = []
        
      340. 
      
        
    340. 
          1
          
          					for i in 1..user_count
        
      341. 
      
        
    341. 
          2
          
          						user_names <<= users[i.to_s]['name']
        
      342. 
      
        
    342. 
          2
          
          						user_email <<= users[i.to_s]['email']
        
      343. 
      
        
    343. 
          2
          
          						user_status <<= users[i.to_s]['status']
        
      344. 
      
        
    344. 
          
          
          					end
        
      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          1
          
          					user_names.should include("Test Name")
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          1
          
          					user_names.should include("Test Other")
        
      347. 
      
        
    347. 
          1
          
          					user_email.should include("t_other@example.com")
        
      348. 
      
        
    348. 
          1
          
          					user_email.should include("test@example.com")
        
      349. 
      
        
    349. 
          1
          
          					user_status.should include(STATUS_ATTENDING)
        
      350. 
      
        
    350. 
          1
          
          					user_status.should include(STATUS_NO_RESPONSE)
        
      351. 
      
        
    351. 
          
          
          				end				
        
      352. 
      
        
    352. 
          
          
          			end

      511.

          					end

    514.

      516. 
      
        
    516. 
          
          
          				end				
        
      517.

          			end
        
      518.

    66.

          			before { @event_id = Event.add_event('A' * (NAME_MAX_LENGTH + 1), 
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          				@admin_id, DateTime.now.to_i + 10, [@admin_id]) }
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          2
          
          			specify { @event_id.should eq ERR_INVALID_NAME }
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          		end
        
      70.

          	end

          1
          
          	describe "#get_user_status, #set_user_status" do
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
          	 	before do
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          3
          
          	  	@admin = User.create(name: 'Example User', 
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
          	  		email: 'exampleuser@example.com')
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          3
          
          	  	@admin_id = @admin.id
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          3
          
          	  	@other = User.create(name: 'Example Friend',
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
          	  		email: 'examplefriend@example.com')
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          3
          
          	  	@other_id = @other.id
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          3
          
          	  	@event_id = Event.add_event('Example Event', @admin_id, 
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
          	  		DateTime.now.to_i + 10, [@admin_id, @other_id])
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          3
          
          	  	@event = Event.find(@event_id)
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          3
          
          	  	@admin.reload
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          3
          
          	  	@other.reload
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
          		end
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
          
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
          		describe "when accessing status initially" do
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          1
          
          			it "should be correct for admin and nonadmin" do
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@admin_id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other_id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          			end	
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
          		end
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
          
        
      187.

          1

      188.

          1
          
          			it "should be correct for admin and nonadmin" do
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          1
          
          				@event.set_user_status(@admin_id, STATUS_NOT_ATTENDING)
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@admin_id).should eq STATUS_NOT_ATTENDING
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          1
          
          				@event.set_user_status(@other_id, STATUS_ATTENDING)
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          1

      193.

          			end
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
          		end

          1

          1
          
          			it "should do nothing" do
        
      198.

          1

      203.

      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          1
          
          	describe "#get_hash" do
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
          		before do
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          2
          
          	  	@admin = User.create(name: 'Example User', 
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
          	  		email: 'exampleuser@example.com')
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          2
          
          	  	@other = User.create(name: 'Example Friend',
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          	  		email: 'examplefriend@example.com')
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
          		end
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
          
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          1
          
          		it "should match the hash data 1" do
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          1
          
          			@event_id = Event.add_event('Example Event', @admin.id, 
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
          	  		DateTime.now.to_i + 10, [@admin.id, @other.id])
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          1
          
          	  	@event = Event.find(@event_id)
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          1
          
          			hash = @event.get_hash
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          1
          
          			hash[:event].should eq @event_id
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          1
          
          			hash[:title].should eq 'Example Event'
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          1
          
          			hash[:creator].should eq @admin.id
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          1
          
          			hash[:time].should eq @event.time
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          1
          
          			hash[:location].should be_blank
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          1
          
          			hash[:description].should be_blank
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          1
          
          			hash[:users].should have(3).items
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          1
          
          			hash[:users][:user_count].should eq 2
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          1
          
          			user_names = [ hash[:users][1][:name], hash[:users][2][:name]]
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          1
          
          			user_emails = [ hash[:users][1][:email], hash[:users][2][:email]]
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          1
          
          			user_status = [ hash[:users][1][:status], hash[:users][2][:status]]
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          1
          
          			user_names.should include("Example User")
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          1
          
          			user_names.should include("Example Friend")
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          1
          
          			user_emails.should include("exampleuser@example.com")
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          1
          
          			user_emails.should include("examplefriend@example.com")
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          1
          
          			user_status.should include(STATUS_NO_RESPONSE)
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          1
          
          			user_status.should include(STATUS_ATTENDING)
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
          		end
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
          
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
          
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          1
          
          		it "should match the hash data 2" do
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          1
          
          			@event_id = Event.add_event('Example Event', @admin.id, 
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
          	  		DateTime.now.to_i + 10, [@admin.id, @other.id], "This is the description of an example event!", "In an example area")
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          1
          
          	  	@event = Event.find(@event_id)
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          1
          
          			hash = @event.get_hash
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          1
          
          			hash[:event].should eq @event_id
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          1
          
          			hash[:title].should eq 'Example Event'
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          1
          
          			hash[:creator].should eq @admin.id
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          1
          
          			hash[:time].should eq @event.time
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          1
          
          			hash[:location].should eq "In an example area"
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          1
          
          			hash[:description].should eq "This is the description of an example event!"
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          1
          
          			hash[:users].should have(3).items
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          1
          
          			hash[:users][:user_count].should eq 2
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          1
          
          			user_names = [ hash[:users][1][:name], hash[:users][2][:name]]
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          1
          
          			user_emails = [ hash[:users][1][:email], hash[:users][2][:email]]
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          1
          
          			user_status = [ hash[:users][1][:status], hash[:users][2][:status]]
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          1
          
          			user_names.should include("Example User")
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          1
          
          			user_names.should include("Example Friend")
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
          			user_emails.should include("exampleuser@example.com")
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          1
          
          			user_emails.should include("examplefriend@example.com")
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          1
          
          			user_status.should include(STATUS_NO_RESPONSE)
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          1
          
          			user_status.should include(STATUS_ATTENDING)
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
          		end
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
          	end
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
          
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          1
          
          	describe "#notify_starting" do
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          1
          
          		before do
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          1
          
          	  	@admin = User.create(name: 'Example User', 
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          
          
          	  		email: 'exampleuser@example.com')
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          1
          
          	  	@other1 = User.create(name: 'Example Friend',
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
          	  		email: 'examplefriend@example.com')
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          1
          
          	  	@other2 = User.create(name: 'Example Friendess', 
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
          	  		email: 'examplefriendess@example.com')
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          1
          
          	  	@event_id = Event.add_event('Example Event', @admin.id, 
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          
          
          	  		DateTime.now.to_i + 10, [@admin.id, @other1.id, @other2.id])
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          1
          
          	  	@event = Event.find(@event_id)
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          1
          
          	  	@admin.reload
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          1
          
          	  	@other1.reload
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          1
          
          	  	@other2.reload
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          1
          
          	  	@event.set_user_status(@other2.id, STATUS_ATTENDING)
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
          		end
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          1
          
          		it "should notify all of the users who are attending" do
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          1
          
          			@other2.notification_list.should have(1).items
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          1
          
          			@other1.notification_list.should have(1).items
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          1
          
          			@admin.notification_list.should have(0).items
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          1
          
          			@event.notify_starting
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          1
          
          			@other2.reload
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          1
          
          			@other1.reload
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          1
          
          			@admin.reload
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          1
          
          			@other2.notification_list.should have(2).items
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          1
          
          			@other1.notification_list.should have(1).items
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          1
          
          			@admin.notification_list.should have(1).items			
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          1
          
          			@other2.notification_list[1][:notif_type].should eq NOTIF_EVENT_STARTING
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          1
          
          			@other2.notification_list[1][:event].should eq @event_id
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          
          
          		end
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          
          
          	end
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
          end
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
          
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          1
          
          describe Event, "compute_horn_formula" do
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          1
          
          	it "should all be false" do
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          1
          
          		clauses = [{operands: 2, value: 0}, {operands: false, value: 1}]
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          1
          
          		result = Event.compute_horn_formula(clauses)
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          1
          
          		result.kind_of?(Hash).should eq true
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          1
          
          		result[0].should eq false
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          1
          
          		result[1].should eq false
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          
          
          	end
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          
          
          end
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          
          
          
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          1
          
          describe Event, "conditional acceptances" do
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          1
          
          	before do
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          16
          
          		@admin = User.new(name: "Test Name", email: "test@example.com",
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          
          
          			password: "test_password")
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          16
          
          		@admin.add
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          16
          
          		@other1 = User.new(name: "Test Other", email: "t_other@example.com",
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          
          
          			password: "test_password")
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          16
          
          		@other1.add
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          16
          
          		@other2 = User.new(name: "Test Second", email: "t_other2@example.com",
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          
          
          			password: "test_password")
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          16
          
          		@other2.add
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          16
          
          		@event_id = Event.add_event("Test Event", @admin.id, 
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          
          
          			DateTime.now.to_i + 10, [@admin.id, @other1.id])
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          16
          
          		@event = Event.find(@event_id)
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          
          
          	end
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          1
          
          	describe "when adding a conditional acceptance" do
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          1
          
          		before do
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          1
          
          			cond = NumberCondition.new(3)
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          1
          
          			@event.add_condition(@other1.id, cond)
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          
          
          		end
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          1
          
          		it "should appear in the party_list but not change status" do
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          1
          
          			@event.party_list[@other1.id][:condition][:cond_type].should eq COND_NUM_ATTENDING
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          1
          
          			@event.party_list[@other1.id][:condition][:num_users].should eq 3
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          1
          
          			@event.party_list[@other1.id][:condition][:cond_met].should eq COND_NOT_MET
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          1
          
          			@event.get_user_status(@other1.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          
          
          		end
        
      331. 
      
        
    331. 
          
          
          	end
        
      332. 
      
        
    332. 
          
          
          
        
      333. 
      
        
    333. 
          1
          
          	describe "when removing a conditional acceptance" do
        
      334. 
      
        
    334. 
          1
          
          		before do
        
      335. 
      
        
    335. 
          2
          
          			cond = NumberCondition.new(3)
        
      336. 
      
        
    336. 
          2
          
          			@event.add_condition(@other1.id, cond)
        
      337. 
      
        
    337. 
          2
          
          			@event.remove_condition(@other1.id)
        
      338. 
      
        
    338. 
          
          
          		end
        
      339. 
      
        
    339. 
          1
          
          		it "should have no condition" do
        
      340. 
      
        
    340. 
          1
          
          			@event.party_list[@other1.id][:condition][:cond_type].should eq COND_NONE
        
      341. 
      
        
    341. 
          
          
          		end
        
      342. 
      
        
    342. 
          1
          
          		it "should no longer do anything when the condition is met" do
        
      343. 
      
        
    343. 
          1
          
          			@event.add_user_list([@other2.id])
        
      344. 
      
        
    344. 
          1
          
          			@event.add_to_user_event_lists([@other2.id])
        
      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          1
          
          			@event.get_user_status(@other1.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          
          
          		end
        
      347. 
      
        
    347. 
          
          
          	end
        
      348. 
      
        
    348. 
          
          
          
        
      349. 
      
        
    349. 
          1
          
          	describe "when a conditional acceptance is met" do
        
      350. 
      
        
    350. 
          1
          
          		describe "ensure that it is detected" do
        
      351. 
      
        
    351. 
          1
          
          			before do 
        
      352. 
      
        
    352. 
          10
          
          				@other3 = User.new(name: "Test Third", email: "t_other3@example.com",
        
      353. 
      
        
    353. 
          
          
          					password: "test_password")
        
      354. 
      
        
    354. 
          10
          
          				@other3.add
        
      355. 
      
        
    355. 
          10
          
          				@other4 = User.new(name: "Test Fourth", email: "t_other4@example.com",
        
      356. 
      
        
    356. 
          
          
          					password: "test_password")
        
      357. 
      
        
    357. 
          10
          
          				@other4.add
        
      358. 
      
        
    358. 
          10
          
          				@other5 = User.new(name: "Test Fifth", email: "t_other5@example.com",
        
      359. 
      
        
    359. 
          
          
          					password: "test_password")
        
      360. 
      
        
    360. 
          10
          
          				@other5.add
        
      361. 
      
        
    361. 
          10
          
          				@event.add_user_list([@other2.id, @other3.id, @other4.id])
        
      362. 
      
        
    362. 
          10
          
          				@event.add_to_user_event_lists([@other2.id, @other3.id, @other4.id])
        
      363. 
      
        
    363. 
          
          
          			end
        
      364. 
      
        
    364. 
          
          
          			# Starting state of event: @admin is attending. @other1-4 are
        
      365. 
      
        
    365. 
          
          
          			# invited but haven't responded. @other5 isn't invited.
        
      366. 
      
        
    366. 
          
          
          
        
      367. 
      
        
    367. 
          1
          
          			it "should detect when enough other users are attending" do
        
      368. 
      
        
    368. 
          1
          
          				cond = NumberCondition.new(5)
        
      369. 
      
        
    369. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other4.id, cond)
        
      370. 
      
        
    370. 
          1
          
          				@event.set_user_status(@other1.id, STATUS_ATTENDING)
        
      371. 
      
        
    371. 
          1
          
          				@event.set_user_status(@other2.id, STATUS_ATTENDING)
        
      372. 
      
        
    372. 
          
          
          				#@event.get_user_status(@other4.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      373. 
      
        
    373. 
          1
          
          				@event.set_user_status(@other3.id, STATUS_ATTENDING)
        
      374. 
      
        
    374. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other4.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      375. 
      
        
    375. 
          1
          
          				@event.party_list[@other4.id][:condition][:cond_met].should eq COND_MET
        
      376. 
      
        
    376. 
          
          
          			end
        
      377. 
      
        
    377. 
          1
          
          			it "should detect when enough other users have number-of-users conditions all with the same number" do
        
      378. 
      
        
    378. 
          1
          
          				cond1 = NumberCondition.new(5)
        
      379. 
      
        
    379. 
          1
          
          				cond2 = NumberCondition.new(5)
        
      380. 
      
        
    380. 
          1
          
          				cond3 = NumberCondition.new(5)
        
      381. 
      
        
    381. 
          1
          
          				cond4 = NumberCondition.new(5)
        
      382. 
      
        
    382. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other1.id, cond1)
        
      383. 
      
        
    383. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other2.id, cond2)
        
      384. 
      
        
    384. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other3.id, cond3)
        
      385. 
      
        
    385. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other1.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      386. 
      
        
    386. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other2.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      387. 
      
        
    387. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      388. 
      
        
    388. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other4.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      389. 
      
        
    389. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other4.id, cond4)
        
      390. 
      
        
    390. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other1.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      391. 
      
        
    391. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other2.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      392. 
      
        
    392. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      393. 
      
        
    393. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other4.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      394. 
      
        
    394. 
          1
          
          				@event.party_list[@other4.id][:condition][:cond_met].should eq COND_MET
        
      395. 
      
        
    395. 
          
          
          			end
        
      396. 
      
        
    396. 
          1
          
          			it "should detect when enough other users have number-of-users conditions all with different numbers" do
        
      397. 
      
        
    397. 
          1
          
          				cond1 = NumberCondition.new(4)
        
      398. 
      
        
    398. 
          1
          
          				cond2 = NumberCondition.new(6)
        
      399. 
      
        
    399. 
          1
          
          				cond3 = NumberCondition.new(3)
        
      400. 
      
        
    400. 
          1
          
          				cond4 = NumberCondition.new(4)
        
      401. 
      
        
    401. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other1.id, cond1)
        
      402. 
      
        
    402. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other2.id, cond2)
        
      403. 
      
        
    403. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other3.id, cond3)
        
      404. 
      
        
    404. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other1.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      405. 
      
        
    405. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other2.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      406. 
      
        
    406. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      407. 
      
        
    407. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other4.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      408. 
      
        
    408. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other4.id, cond4)
        
      409. 
      
        
    409. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other1.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      410. 
      
        
    410. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other2.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      411. 
      
        
    411. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      412. 
      
        
    412. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other4.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      413. 
      
        
    413. 
          1
          
          				@event.party_list[@other4.id][:condition][:cond_met].should eq COND_MET
        
      414. 
      
        
    414. 
          1
          
          				@event.party_list[@other2.id][:condition][:cond_met].should eq COND_NOT_MET
        
      415. 
      
        
    415. 
          
          
          			end
        
      416. 
      
        
    416. 
          1
          
          			it "should detect when any of the users join for an any-user-type condition" do
        
      417. 
      
        
    417. 
          1
          
          				cond = UserCondition.new(COND_USER_ATTENDING_ANY, [ @other4.id, @other2.id ])
        
      418. 
      
        
    418. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other3.id, cond)
        
      419. 
      
        
    419. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      420. 
      
        
    420. 
          1
          
          				@event.set_user_status(@other2.id, STATUS_ATTENDING)
        
      421. 
      
        
    421. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      422. 
      
        
    422. 
          1
          
          				@event.party_list[@other3.id][:condition][:cond_met].should eq COND_MET
        
      423. 
      
        
    423. 
          
          
          			end
        
      424. 
      
        
    424. 
          1
          
          			it "should detect when all of the users join for an all-user-type condition" do
        
      425. 
      
        
    425. 
          1
          
          				cond = UserCondition.new(COND_USER_ATTENDING_ALL, [ @other4.id, @other2.id ])
        
      426. 
      
        
    426. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other3.id, cond)
        
      427. 
      
        
    427. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      428. 
      
        
    428. 
          1
          
          				@event.set_user_status(@other2.id, STATUS_ATTENDING)
        
      429. 
      
        
    429. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      430. 
      
        
    430. 
          1
          
          				@event.party_list[@other3.id][:condition][:cond_met].should eq COND_NOT_MET
        
      431. 
      
        
    431. 
          1
          
          				@event.set_user_status(@other4.id, STATUS_ATTENDING)
        
      432. 
      
        
    432. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      433. 
      
        
    433. 
          1
          
          				@event.party_list[@other3.id][:condition][:cond_met].should eq COND_MET
        
      434. 
      
        
    434. 
          
          
          			end
        
      435. 
      
        
    435. 
          1
          
          			it "should detect a two-person cycle of any-user-type conditions" do
        
      436. 
      
        
    436. 
          1
          
          				cond1 = UserCondition.new(COND_USER_ATTENDING_ANY, [ @other4.id, @other2.id ])
        
      437. 
      
        
    437. 
          1
          
          				cond2 = UserCondition.new(COND_USER_ATTENDING_ANY, [ @other3.id ])
        
      438. 
      
        
    438. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other3.id, cond1)
        
      439. 
      
        
    439. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      440. 
      
        
    440. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other4.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE				
        
      441. 
      
        
    441. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other4.id, cond2)
        
      442. 
      
        
    442. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other4.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      443. 
      
        
    443. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      444. 
      
        
    444. 
          1
          
          				@event.party_list[@other4.id][:condition][:cond_met].should eq COND_MET
        
      445. 
      
        
    445. 
          1
          
          				@event.party_list[@other3.id][:condition][:cond_met].should eq COND_MET
        
      446. 
      
        
    446. 
          
          
          			end
        
      447. 
      
        
    447. 
          1
          
          			it "should detect a cyclic mix of any- and all-user-type conditions when satisfied by a final condition" do
        
      448. 
      
        
    448. 
          1
          
          				cond1 = UserCondition.new(COND_USER_ATTENDING_ALL, [ @other4.id, @other2.id ])
        
      449. 
      
        
    449. 
          1
          
          				cond2 = UserCondition.new(COND_USER_ATTENDING_ANY, [ @other3.id ])
        
      450. 
      
        
    450. 
          1
          
          				cond3 = UserCondition.new(COND_USER_ATTENDING_ALL, [ @other4.id, @other3.id, @other1.id ])
        
      451. 
      
        
    451. 
          1
          
          				cond4 = UserCondition.new(COND_USER_ATTENDING_ANY, [ @other2.id, @other3.id, @other4.id ])
        
      452. 
      
        
    452. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other3.id, cond1)
        
      453. 
      
        
    453. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      454. 
      
        
    454. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other4.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE				
        
      455. 
      
        
    455. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other4.id, cond2)
        
      456. 
      
        
    456. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other4.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      457. 
      
        
    457. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      458. 
      
        
    458. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other2.id, cond3)
        
      459. 
      
        
    459. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other4.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      460. 
      
        
    460. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      461. 
      
        
    461. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other2.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      462. 
      
        
    462. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other1.id, cond4)
        
      463. 
      
        
    463. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other1.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      464. 
      
        
    464. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other2.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      465. 
      
        
    465. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      466. 
      
        
    466. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other4.id).should eq STATUS_ATTENDING
        
      467. 
      
        
    467. 
          1
          
          				@event.party_list[@other4.id][:condition][:cond_met].should eq COND_MET
        
      468. 
      
        
    468. 
          1
          
          				@event.party_list[@other3.id][:condition][:cond_met].should eq COND_MET
        
      469. 
      
        
    469. 
          
          
          			end
        
      470. 
      
        
    470. 
          1
          
          			it "should detect a cyclic mix of any- and all-user-type conditions when satisfied by a user joining" do
        
      471. 
      
        
    471. 
          1
          
          				cond1 = UserCondition.new(COND_USER_ATTENDING_ALL, [ @other4.id, @other2.id ])
        
      472. 
      
        
    472. 
          1
          
          				cond2 = UserCondition.new(COND_USER_ATTENDING_ANY, [ @other3.id ])
        
      473. 
      
        
    473. 
          1
          
          				cond3 = UserCondition.new(COND_USER_ATTENDING_ALL, [ @other4.id, @other3.id, @other1.id ])
        
      474. 
      
        
    474. 
          1
          
          				@event.add_condition(@other3.id, cond1)
        
      475. 
      
        
    475. 
          1
          
          				@event.get_user_status(@other3.id).should eq STATUS_NO_RESPONSE
        
      476. 
      
        
    476. 
          1

    spec/models/user_spec.rb

    97.89 % covered

    1. 
          
          
          # Unit Tests for User model.
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
          require 'spec_helper'
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
          describe User, "#add" do
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
          	describe ":name field" do
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
          		context ":name can be sequence of alphabet characters with one space character in between" do
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
          			it "returns SUCCESS" do
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
          				user = User.new(name: "Bob SmItH", email: "user0@example.com", password: "nopassword")
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
          				user.add.should eq(SUCCESS)
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          			end
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          		end
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
          		context ":name can contain dot and colon characters" do
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
          			it "returns SUCCESS" do
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
          				user = User.new(name: "J.R. O'Brian", email: "user1@example.com", password: "nopassword")
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
          				user.add.should eq(SUCCESS)
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          			end
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          		end
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
          
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
          		context ":name cannot be an empty string" do
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
          			it "returns ERR_INVALID_NAME" do
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
          				user = User.new(name: "", email: "user2@example.com", password: "nopassword")
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
          				user.add.should eq(ERR_INVALID_NAME)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          			end
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          		end
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
          		context ":name cannot contain number characters" do
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
          			it "returns ERR_INVALID_NAME" do
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
          				user = User.new(name: "a1b2c", email: "user3@example.com", password: "nopassword")
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
          				user.add.should eq(ERR_INVALID_NAME)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          			end
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          		end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
          		context ":name cannot contain non-alphabet characters other than dot and colon" do

          1

      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1

    38. 
          1
          
          				user.add.should eq(ERR_INVALID_NAME)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          			end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          		end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
          		context ":name cannot contains leading white-space characters" do

          1

    44. 
          1

      46.

          			end
        
      47.

          		end

          1
          
          describe User, "#login" do
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          1
          
          	before(:each) do
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          3
          
          		@user = User.new(name: "Hello World", email: "hello@world.com", password: "nopassword")
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          3
          
          		@user.add
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
          	end
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
          
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          1
          
          	context "with correct credentials" do
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          1
          
          		it "should have success, err_code: SUCCESS" do
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
          			other = User.new(email: "hello@world.com", password: "nopassword")
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          1
          
          			other.login[:err_code].should eq(SUCCESS)
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          		end
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
          	end
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
          
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1
          
          	context "with unregistered email" do
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
          		it "should have error, error_code: ERR_BAD_CREDENTIALS" do
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          1
          
          			other = User.new(email: "bye@world.com", password: "nopassword")
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          1
          
          			other.login[:err_code].should eq(ERR_BAD_CREDENTIALS)
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
          		end
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
          	end
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
          
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          1
          
          	context "with wrong password" do
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
          		it "should have error, err_code: ERR_BAD_CREDENTIALS" do
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
          			other = User.new(email: "hello@world.com", password: "yespassword")
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          1
          
          			other.login[:err_code].should eq(ERR_BAD_CREDENTIALS)
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
          		end
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
          	end
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
          
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
          end
        
      172.

      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          1
          
          describe User, "#add_friend, #delete_friend" do
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          1
          
          	before(:each) do
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          4
          
          		@first = User.new(name: "first", email: "first@test.com", password: "nopassword")
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          4
          
          		@first.add
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          4
          
          		@second = User.new(name: "second", email: "second@test.com", password: "nopassword")
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          4
          
          		@second.add
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          4
          
          		@third = User.new(name: "third", email: "third@test.com", password: "nopassword")
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          4
          
          		@third.add
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          4
          
          		@first.concat_friend("second@test.com")
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          4
          
          		@first.concat_friend("third@test.com")
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
          	end
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          1
          
          	context "Adding a friend twice" do
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1
          
          		it "should not change friend_list" do
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          1
          
          			@first.concat_friend("second@test.com")
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          1
          
          			@first.friend_list.length.should eq(2)
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
          		end
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
          	end
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
          
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          1
          
          	context "Adding an invalid user as friend" do
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          1
          
          		it "should error, error_code = ERR_UNSUCCESSFUL" do
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          1
          
          			rval = @first.concat_friend("failure@test.com")
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          1
          
          			rval.should eq(ERR_UNSUCCESSFUL)
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
          		end
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
          	end
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
          
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
          	context "Added friend should receive notification" do
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          1
          
          		it "indicated by having +1 notification_list length" do
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          1
          
          			User.find_by(email: "third@test.com").notification_list.size.should eq(1)
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
          		end
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
          	end
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
          
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
          	context "Delete a friend in friend_list" do
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          1
          
          		it "should remove the friend_id" do
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          1
          
          			@first.remove_friend("second@test.com")
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          1
          
          			@first.friend_list.length.should eq(1)
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          		end
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
          	end
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
          
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
          end
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
          
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          1
          
          describe User, "#add_event, #delete_event, #post_notification" do
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          1
          
          	before do
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          2
          
          		@user1 = User.new(name: "User One", email: "user1@example.com",
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          2
          
          		@user1.add
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          2
          
          		@user2 = User.new(name: "User Two", email: "user2@example.com",
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          2
          
          		@user2.add
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          2
          
          		@user3 = User.new(name: "User Three", email: "user3@example.com",
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          2
          
          		@user3.add
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
          	end
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
          
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          1
          
          	describe "when adding/removing a valid event" do
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          1
          
          		before do
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          2
          
          			@event1_id = Event.add_event("Test Event", @user1.id, 
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
          				DateTime.now.to_i + 10, [@user1.id])
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          2
          
          			@event1 = Event.find(@event1_id)
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          2
          
          			@user1.add_event(@event1.id)
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          2
          
          			@user2.add_event(@event1.id)
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          2
          
          			@notif = EventNotification.new(NOTIF_NEW_EVENT, @event1)
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          2
          
          			@user1.post_notification( @notif )
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          2
          
          			@user2.post_notification( @notif )
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
          		end
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          1
          
          		it "should get added succesfully" do
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          1
          
          			@user1.event_list.should include @event1.id
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          1
          
          			@user2.event_list.should include @event1.id
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          1
          
          			@user3.event_list.should_not include @event1.id
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          1
          
          			event1_notif_count = 0
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          1
          
          			@user1.notification_list.each do |notif|
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          1
          
          				event1_notif_count += 1 if notif[:event] == @event1.id
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
          			end
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          1
          
          			@user2.notification_list.each do |notif|
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          1
          
          				event1_notif_count += 1 if notif[:event] == @event1.id
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
          			end		
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          1
          
          			@user3.notification_list.each do |notif|
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
          				event1_notif_count += 1 if notif[:event] == @event1.id
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          
          
          			end
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          1
          
          			event1_notif_count.should eq 2
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          
          
          		end
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          1
          
          		it "should be removed succesfully" do
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
          			@user1.delete_event(@event1.id)
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          1
          
          			@user2.delete_event(@event1.id)
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          1
          
          			@user3.delete_event(@event1.id)
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          1
          
          			@user1.event_list.should_not include @event1.id
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          1
          
          			@user2.event_list.should_not include @event1.id
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          1
          
          			@user3.event_list.should_not include @event1.id
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          1
          
          			event1_notif_count = 0
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          1
          
          			@user1.notification_list.each do |notif|
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
          				event1_notif_count += 1 if notif[:event] == @event1.id
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
          			end
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          1
          
          			@user2.notification_list.each do |notif|
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          
          
          				event1_notif_count += 1 if notif[:event] == @event1.id
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
          			end		
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          1
          
          			@user3.notification_list.each do |notif|
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
          				event1_notif_count += 1 if notif[:event] == @event1.id
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          
          
          			end
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          1
          
          			event1_notif_count.should eq 0
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          
          
          		end
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          
          
          	end
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          
          
          end
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
          
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          1
          
          describe User, "#add_group, #delete_group" do
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          1
          
          	before do
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          2
          
          		@user1 = User.new(name: "User One", email: "user1@example.com",
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          2
          
          		@user1.add
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          2
          
          		@user2 = User.new(name: "User Two", email: "user2@example.com",
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          2
          
          		@user2.add
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          2
          
          		@user3 = User.new(name: "User Three", email: "user3@example.com",
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
          				password: "test_password")
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          2
          
          		@user3.add
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          
          
          	end
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
          
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          1
          
          	describe "when adding/removing a valid group" do
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          1
          
          		before do
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          2
          
          			@group1 = Group.new(name: "Test Group", user_list: [@user1.id])
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          2
          
          			@user1.add_group(@group1.id)
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          2
          
          			@user2.add_group(@group1.id)
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
          		end
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          1
          
          		it "should get added succesfully" do
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          1
          
          			@user1.group_list.should include @group1.id
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          1
          
          			@user2.group_list.should include @group1.id
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          1
          
          			@user3.group_list.should_not include @group1.id
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          
          
          		end
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          1
          
          		it "should be removed succesfully" do
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          1
          
          			@user1.delete_group(@group1.id)
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          1
          
          			@user2.delete_group(@group1.id)
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          1
          
          			@user3.delete_group(@group1.id)
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          1
          
          			@user1.group_list.should_not include @group1.id
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          1
          
          			@user2.group_list.should_not include @group1.id
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          1
          
          			@user3.group_list.should_not include @group1.id
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          
          
          		end
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          
          
          	end
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          
          
          end
        
      310.
